job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtthe ideal candidate will be responsible for developing highquality applications they will also be responsible for designing and implementing testable and scalable codeampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltpgtexperience band years software engineersltpgtltulgtltligtextremely proficient in embedded c bare metal device driver development board bring up and bsplow level closer to hardware platform software developmentltligtltligtexpertise in bsp and drivers for at least one or more of the following pcieusbufsnand exposure to linux drivers is nice to have but not mandatoryltligtltligtbeyond the driver software a deep protocol level understanding of one or more of the following usbufspcie is expectedltligtltligtgood knowledge on microprocessorsmicrocontrollers arm mpu armvarmv architecturesltligtltligtshould have experience in linux internals or rtos ipc message queues shared memory semaphores multithreading mutex etcltligtltligtfamiliarity with open source linux kernel and development practicesltligtltligthands on experience with lab instruments like oscilloscopes waveforms analyzers lauterbachjtag is a plusltligtltligta selfmanaged individual with excellent problemsolving skillsltligtltulgt
